doc.title: 5 Guys, 5 Questions...
doc.plot: Five guys from different walks of life discuss five topics, from breast feeding in public to how to snag a babe at the local pub. See how these guys communicate with their significant others. Find out who is the "Purple Panty Bandit" and who has never gotten any at all...
